notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsomega.8b03241.
Gel permeation chromatography for B2 aliphatic acrylic acrylate; GPC results of B2 aliphatic acrylic acrylate; CdSe/ZnS QDs in a mixture of B2 oligomer, TMSPMA monomer, and photoinitiators; red and green CdSe/ZnS QD/polymer-based WLED ( PDF)
